column5: Improve your employability for roles in data science with specialist knowledge in machine learning, statistics and software technology.Data science drives a significant proportion of global economic activity from healthcare to finance and technology. It's influencing scientific progress across numerous fields including bioscience, energy and telecommunications. This course provides you with the computational skills, tools and strong mathematical foundation to become an industry expert. You'll gain an understanding of the balanced combination of science and technology required for delivering effective data science.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full-time; 2 years full-time including professional placement
